summary: To save Ken from the love-smitten passion-fairy, Princess Graciella, Barbie, her stylish fairy-friends, and her co-star travel to the glamorous fairy-city of Gloss Angeles. Is the power of friendship greater than magic?
cast: Diana Kaarina|Adrian Petriw|Britt Irvin|Cassandra Lee Morris|Kate Higgins|Silvio Pollio|Brittney Wilson|Alexandra Carter|Nicole Oliver|Barbara Tyson|Candus Churchill|Nathaniel DeVeaux|Michael Dobson|Laura Bailey
title: Barbie: El secreto de las hadas
